analyzed: abhimṛtāḥ a bhimukhyena mṛtāḥ yogyatayā jīvantaḥ eva amātyānām santata maraṇa darśanena svayam api maraṇāt bhītāḥ iti arthaḥ
tebhyaḥ tad artha santata maraṇa bhaya nivṛtti arti auttarayā imam jīvebhyaḥ
iti anayā a paridhim mṛtyoḥ antardhāna bhūtam aśmānam dakṣiṇatas nidadhāti
etat ca tantra śeṣa ante
kṛtvā iti ktvā pratyaya balāt
kecid nidadhāti pratiṣṭhāpayati
paridhi vacanāt ca tasya aśmanaḥ pracyāvanam na kartavyam iti
dadhāti dadāti iti gviruktiḥ praśna samāpti sūcana ārtā
ittham sudarśana āryeṇa gṛhya tātparya darśanam
kṛtam bhāṣya anusāreṇa yathāmati yathāśrutam
atra anuktam duruktam vā mateḥ māndyāt śutasya vā
sat mārga pravaṇānām naḥ kṣantum arhanti paṇḍitāḥ

original: iti śrīsudarśanācāryaviracite gṛhyatātparyadarśane trayoviṃśaḥ khamḍaḥ asṭamaśca paṭalassamāptaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī sudarśana ācārya viracite gṛhya tātparya darśane trayoviṃśaḥ khamḍaḥ asṭamaḥ ca paṭalaḥ samāptaḥ
samāptā iyam gṛhya sūtra vyākhyā
